title: Process Owner Distribution
description: After paying all monthly expenses, the agent needs to send the remaining net income to the property owner.

tasks.description: Calculate the net operating income (NOI) for the property for the previous month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the distributable funds.

tasks.description: Verify the owner's bank account details and the agreed-upon reserve amount to be held in the trust account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the payment details and reserve requirements.

tasks.description: Initiate an ACH transfer to the owner for the calculated distribution amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the payment to the owner.
